original_text: for I was afraid of you, because you are a severe man. You take what you did not deposit, and reap what you did not sow.’
korean_text: 이는 당신이 엄한 사람인 것을 내가 무서워함이라 당신은 두지 않은 것을 취하고 심지 않은 것을 거두나이다

sentences.original_text: for I was afraid of you
because you are a severe man
You take what you did not deposit
and reap what you did not sow
